verbs.description: Novartis ( NOVN.S ) General Counsel Felix Ehrat [V: will] leave the Swiss drugmaker over his role in a $ 1.2 million contract it struck with the lawyer for U.S. President Donald Trump , saying on Wednesday the pact was legal but an error .
